scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules && pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules
scripts.version-patch: pnpm -r exec pnpm version patch && git add packages/*/package.json && git commit -m 'chore: bump version'
scripts.release:path: pnpm run clean && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm run version-patch && pnpm run publish
